title: Life in the Fast Lane, 2nd edition
description: This fast-paced young adult novel tells the tale of a teen who can't really find her place until a new girl moves into town. In a world full of temptation, Jessica gets into more trouble than she bargained for. A must-read young adult novel of love, life, and growing up in the 80's. Mature content recommended for ages 14 and up.This story is an excellent way to open up the communication lines between you and your teen! Features:*Fast paced*Short chapters for easier reading*Numerous twists and turns in the plot*"Teaches" about touchy topics parents often avoid This book is great for teens, mothers, and even grandmothers. It's so crucial to keep the lines of communication open with teens and this is a very non-threatening way to do it without prying into her private life! Read it together and talk about the situations in this book. Chances are, he/she either knows or will know someone who has already experienced the situations in this story.Plus, if you are a parent in your 20's and 30's, or even in your 40's, you'll appreciate the fact that the setting is in the '80's so a lot of it may be nostalgic too! **2nd edition has a different beginning and twist at the end**
author: Michelle McCorkle
